chapters.title: Chapter 2:  Unweaving
chapters.info: Martine Janata, p. 75 (73)—Aes Sedai of unknown (most likely Brown) Ajah. She was the last sister to really study ter'angreal. She did so for over forty years, and was very careful. She was found burned out and unconscious by her maid; her memory of the entire preceeding week was erased.
